path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Callisto_Network/Gems & Goblins ICO Security Audit Report - Callisto Network.md

findings.title: Crosschain Address Collisions
findings.description: Transactions can be mistakenly sent to a contract's address on a different chain (ETH, ETC, CLO, etc.). To mitigate this, deploying a 'mock contract' that allows token withdrawal or prevents fund deposits at the address is recommended.

findings.title: Missing test suite
findings.description: The contract is missing a test suite to validate and verify the behavior of the contract functionalities.

findings.title: Open-Source Contract
findings.description: The contract's source code should be accessible for public scrutiny.

findings.title: Bug Bounty Program
findings.description: Initiating a bug bounty program post-audit for comprehensive security validation is recommended.

findings.title: Public testing
findings.description: The contract should undergo public testing to detect unforeseen bugs or issues.

findings.title: Automated Anomaly Detection System: Not Implemented
findings.description: Establishing a simple anomaly detection algorithm to monitor and respond to unusual activities is advised.

findings.title: Multi-signature Owner Account
findings.description: The ownership must be transferred to a multi-sig contract due to the owner having unlimited rights to do everything.

findings.title: Standard ERC20-Related Issues
findings.description: Incorporate a function to extract unintended ERC20 tokens from the contract.
